languages.text: "Брось, она ненавидела это место. "Рассадник сплетен и нытиков", — так она говорила. А вот я скучала по пуховым перинам..."
"Come on, she despised this place. She called it a 'nest of gossips and malcontents.' I have missed sleeping in a feather bed, mind..."
languages.original_text: "Брось, она ненавидела это место. "Рассадник сплетен и нытиков", — так она говорила. А вот я скучала по пуховым перинам..."

traits.locale_text: "Come on, she despised this place. She called it a 'nest of gossips and malcontents.' I have missed sleeping in a feather bed, mind..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Come on, she despised this place. She called it a 'nest of gossips and malcontents.' I have missed sleeping in a feather bed, mind..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Come on, she despised this place. She called it a 'nest of gossips and malcontents.' I have missed sleeping in a feather bed, mind..."

traits.locale_text: "Come on, she despised this place. She called it a 'nest of gossips and malcontents.' I have missed sleeping in a feather bed, mind..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “得了吧，她才看不上这个地方呢。她说这个地方是‘流言蜚语和不满分子的巢穴’。我真怀念睡在羽毛床上的日子，彻底放空……”
languages.original_text: "Come on, she despised this place. She called it a 'nest of gossips and malcontents.' I have missed sleeping in a feather bed, mind..."

traits.locale_text: “得了吧，她才看不上这个地方呢。她说这个地方是‘流言蜚语和不满分子的巢穴’。我真怀念睡在羽毛床上的日子，彻底放空……”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No se ponga sentimental, que ella detestaba este sitio. Lo llamaba "nido de habladurías e insatisfacción". Aunque he echado de menos dormir en un colchón de plumas, la verdad...».
languages.original_text: "Come on, she despised this place. She called it a 'nest of gossips and malcontents.' I have missed sleeping in a feather bed, mind..."

traits.locale_text: «No se ponga sentimental, que ella detestaba este sitio. Lo llamaba "nido de habladurías e insatisfacción". Aunque he echado de menos dormir en un colchón de plumas, la verdad...».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「彼女はこの場所を軽蔑していたわ。ここを「ゴシップと不満分子の巣窟」と呼んでいたのだから。私は、ふかふかのベッドで眠るのが恋しかったけれど…」
languages.original_text: "Come on, she despised this place. She called it a 'nest of gossips and malcontents.' I have missed sleeping in a feather bed, mind..."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女はこの場所を軽蔑していたわ。ここを「ゴシップと不満分子の巣窟」と呼んでいたのだから。私は、ふかふかのベッドで眠るのが恋しかったけれど…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Kommt schon, sie hat diesen Ort gehasst. Sie hat ihn stets als 'Hort von Intrigen und Gerüchten' bezeichnet. Allerdings sehne ich mich nach einem weichen Federbett ..."
languages.original_text: "Come on, she despised this place. She called it a 'nest of gossips and malcontents.' I have missed sleeping in a feather bed, mind..."

traits.locale_text: "Kommt schon, sie hat diesen Ort gehasst. Sie hat ihn stets als 'Hort von Intrigen und Gerüchten' bezeichnet. Allerdings sehne ich mich nach einem weichen Federbett ..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Allons, elle avait horreur de cet endroit. Elle disait que ce n'était rien d'autre qu'un nid à commères et râleurs invétérés. Cela dit, je suis bien contente de pouvoir de nouveau dormir sur un matelas de plumes... »
languages.original_text: "Come on, she despised this place. She called it a 'nest of gossips and malcontents.' I have missed sleeping in a feather bed, mind..."

traits.locale_text: « Allons, elle avait horreur de cet endroit. Elle disait que ce n'était rien d'autre qu'un nid à commères et râleurs invétérés. Cela dit, je suis bien contente de pouvoir de nouveau dormir sur un matelas de plumes... »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Yapma, o buradan hiç hazzetmezdi ki. Dedikodunun, fesatçıların yuvası derdi. Gerçi yalan yok, tüy yatakta uyumayı da özlemişim."
languages.original_text: "Come on, she despised this place. She called it a 'nest of gossips and malcontents.' I have missed sleeping in a feather bed, mind..."

traits.locale_text: "Yapma, o buradan hiç hazzetmezdi ki. Dedikodunun, fesatçıların yuvası derdi. Gerçi yalan yok, tüy yatakta uyumayı da özlemişim."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
